loans.name: Muong

texts.en: Muong is 44 years old. She has a common-law relationship with her husband and has been blessed with five children: four are married and her last-born child is single and living together with her in Prey Chor district. Muong generates her income by cultivating rice crops within the two seasons of the year. Muong wants to upgrade her living standards and pursue a comfortable life. So recently she has applied for a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase a few heads of breeding pigs to raise. Muong hopes that she’ll be able to provide her children with basic necessities and ensure a bright future for them as she strives to work harder.

loans.use: to purchase a few heads of breeding pigs to raise

loans.name: Esforzados Y Valientes Group

texts.en:
The 'Esforzados y Valientes' community bank has three members.  Each member has her own business.

The leader of this group is María Nery who is single and has two children.  Her business is making and selling pottery.  Her workshop is located in her home, in the small village of Paso Hondo, in Nacaome, Valle department.  She has been in this business for many years and her main customers are people who pass by her business as it is located on the Panamericana Highway which leads to Amatillo.  People also order her products from Valle de Angeles.  On this occasion, she is requesting a loan for 8,000 lempira to invest in buying clay, firewood, brushes and paints with which to make her products.  

The other members of this group are Heydi and Marcia Jackeline.  They are neighbors and are in the same business.  Each one has her own workshop and craft business.

loans.use: to buy the materials she needs to make pottery.

loans.name: Nakimbzanga Ii Group

texts.fr:
Mme MAHAMOUNIN est la représentante du groupe NAKIMBZANGA II. Elle est  mariée  et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé  a 11ans et  le moins âgé a 05ans. 02 vont  à l’école. Elle a 02 personnes  en charge.

Elle vend du savon et des pagnes bazin depuis 05ans. Elle s’approvisionne  au marché du secteur 10 en ville. Ses clients sont  les femmes et les hommes.

Elle veut  s’acheter 12 complets de pagnes simple, 05 pagnes bazin et 03 carton de savon.

 Mme utilises ses bénéfices pour s’occuper de sa famille. Elle ambitionne  ouvrir une boutique de vente de pagne au marché de ¨ poussière yaar ¨.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mahamounin is the representative of the Nakimbzanga II group. She is married and the mother of two children, 11 and 5 years of age. Both children are in school. She has two dependents. For the last five years she has been selling soap and  traditional colorful cloth. She stocks up at the Sector 10 market in the city. She sells to both women and men.

She would like to buy 12 sets of simple traditional “pagnes” cloth, five sets of damask-type “bazin” cloth and three boxes of soap.
Mrs. Mahamounin uses her revenues to take care of her family’s needs. Her goal is to open a store for selling traditional cloths at the market of "Pouissière yaar."

loans.use: to buy 12 sets of simple traditional “pagnes” cloth, five sets of damask-type “bazin” cloth and three boxes of soap.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en:
Anastacia is a 36-year-old married woman with 4 children aged between 5 and 13. Anastacia is a farmer working in Trinidad, Bohol. She primarily grows rice crops to sell. She is able to provide for her family with her income from farming. She works hard to support her family. She plans to use the loan to purchase fertilizers, seeds, and other farm inputs.

In the future, Anastacia hopes to have a successful business and successful children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds, and other farm inputs

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en: Lucia is from San Jose, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 50 years old. Lucia is married and has 2 children. To make a living, Lucia raises crops, mainly coconuts. Lucia has been in her business for 10 years and earns approximately 8,000 PHP a month from it. In 2009, Lucia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Lucia is requesting a new loan of 16,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase land to raise additional crops. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase land to raise additional crops

location.town: San Jose, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Bensie

texts.en:
Bensie is 36 years old and lives in Rizal, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with no dependents. 

Bensie has a general store business and earns approximately PHP 10,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase more stock for her general store. 

Bensie has been a member of PMPC for almost a year. In the future, Bensie hopes to open another store.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Asociación Comunal Pilas Orientales Group

texts.es: La Asociación Comunal para el Desarrollo de Proyectos de Agua y Otros, Las Pilas Orientales fue fundada en 1992, para dar solución a problemas de abastecimiento de agua de las comarcas del norte de Masaya. En la actualidad abastece a 5 comunidades, para un total de 845 usuarios, siendo la población abastecida de 4,225 personas. El sistema de bombeo es directo desde el pozo hasta los hogares de cada usuario. Están solicitando el préstamo para invertir en el cambio de válvulas de aire y medidor madre y accesorios para el buen funcionamiento del sistema de bombeo. Con esta inversión se garantizará que el agua extraída del pozo se bombee con la presión requerida para que pueda llagar con buen caudal a los hogares de cada uno de los usuarios.
texts.en: The las Pilas Orientales Communal Association for the Development of Water and Other Projects was founded in 1992 to solve water supply problems in the north Masaya regions. At present it supplies 5 communities, for a total of 845 users. with a community of 4,225 people supplied. They are asking for the loan to invest in changing the air valves and the main guage and in accessories for the good functioning of the pump system. With this investment, it will be ensured that the water extracted from the well will be pumped with the pressure required for it to arrive with a good volume to the homes of each of the users.

loans.use: to buy air valves and a main guage.

loans.name: Jose Danilo

texts.en: José Danilo has been selling fish and shrimp for ten years. He makes his sales door-to-door around the communities of San Lorenzo and Nacaomé. He transports his products in his car and then goes out and sells them. Another of his business activities is running a mill in his home where he grinds corn for his neighbors. He is requesting a loan of 5,000 Honduran lempira to buy fish to sell during Holy Week and improve his corn grinding facilities. This is a busy period for fish sales and he would like to make the most of the busiest season of the year. He would like to buy dried fish to sell. His dream is to grow his business.

loans.use: to improve his corn grinding business and to buy fish to sell in Holy Week.

loans.name: Dalila  Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora, es habitante del mucipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su familia, su pareja labora por cuenta propia actualmente como vendedor, ella por problemas de salud se tuvo que salir del trabajo de domestica ya que se estaba dañandose ella misma, con el esfuerzo de ambos reunieron un pequeño fondo lo que le permitio poner un negocio de ropa, utiles escolares, zapatos, entre otros, este gracias a la demanda que a obtenido durante ocho meses a logrado estar rotando su negocio ; pero ella necesita de un financimineto para poder incrementar mas su utilidades y asi mejorar sus ingresos ; ya que ahora depende economicamente de su negocio y necesita solventar las necesidades del hogar , agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afododenic atravez de los fon kiva. El prestamo lo quiere para la compra de ropa y utililes escolares ya que son estos los productos de mas demanda .
texts.en: This lady lives in the town of Ticuantepe with her family.  Her partner is self employed and currently works as a salesman.  For health reasons, Dalila had to stop working as a domestic employee.  The work was damaging her health.  With their joint efforts, she and her partner got together a small sum of money which allowed them to set up a business selling clothing, school supplies, shoes and other products.  Thanks to the demand that she has had over the past eight months, she has managed to keep her business running.  However, she needs a loan so that she can further increase and improve her profits and income as she is now financially dependent on her business and needs to cover her household needs.  Dalila is grateful for the support she receives from Afodenic through their Kiva funds. She wants a loan to buy clothing and school supplies, as these products are in highest demand.

loans.use: to buy clothing and school supplies.

loans.name: Gioconda

texts.es:
Geoconda de  de 35 años  de edad, es casada labora como docente de primaria en la desde hace 15 años, caracterizando por ser una persona que ama su labor de impartir el pan de la enseñanza a niños de su comunidad, se ha destacado por una responsable, honesta y bien trabajadora.  

Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que se dedica a la venta y compra de ganado, ambos son muy trabajadores y reconocidos en el municipio, comparten los gastos del hogar y los compromisos adquiridos.  Geoconda esta solicitando financiamiento de su 2do credito con el cual pretende mejorar su casa embaldozandola.
texts.en:
Gioconda is 35 years old and is married. She has worked as an elementary school teacher for fifteen years, and she is described as a person who loves her work of sharing the bread of learning with the children in the community. She is known to be responsible, honest and very hardworking.

She has support from her husband, who buys and sells cattle. Both are very hardworking and are well-known in the city. They share household expenses and any commitments they take on.

Gioconda is asking for her second loan, which she will use to improve her house by tiling it.

loans.use: to improve her house by tiling it.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria labora como sub directora en una escuela del municipio desde  hace 24 en docencia, es un mujer  responsable de buenos costumbres en su comunidad muy querida por sus compañeros de trabajo y sus alumnos, ella  cuenta con la ayuda econòmica de su compañero de vida quien se dedica al trabajo en la finca, donde obtienen ingresos adicionales para solventar los gastos del hogar.

Solicita su crèdito para mejorar la infraestructura de su casa, repellandola para darle mayor durabilidad, ya que su sueño es tener una vivienda digna donde pueda vivir comoda, como tambien que sus hijos vayan mejorando sus condiciones vida y que forman su propio hogar lleno de mucho amor a Dios
texts.en:
Maria works as an assistant principal at a local elementary School.  She has been teaching for 24 years.  She is a responsible and well-mannered woman and is very well liked in her community by her work colleagues and her students.  She has the financial help of her life partner who works on a farm.  This makes them additional income with which to cover their household expenses.

Maria is requesting her sixth loan to improve the infrastructure of her home.  She will plaster the house in order to make it more durable.  Her dream is to have a decent home where she can live comfortably.  She would also like her children to improve their living conditions and to form their own homes full of love for God.

loans.use: to plaster her house.

loans.name: Valentina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Valentina de 38 años de edad casada, labora desde hace 17 años como docente en Juigalpa. Esta solicitando su credito con el objetivo continuar mejorando su vivienda poniendole la ceramica a la salita de su casa y brindarle a su familia  mejores condiciones de vida.  

Cabe señalar que el credito anterior fue utilizado para la construccion de un anexo en su casa lo cual logro con el apoyo que kiva le brindo, por eso expresa sentirse muy agradecida con los financiamientos otorgados, pues su casita es de proyecto por lo que era pequeña pero poco a poco ha ido construyendo y acondicionando para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Valentina, 38, is married and has worked as a teacher in Juigalpa for 17 years.  She is requesting her eighth loan with the goal of continuing to improve her house, putting ceramic tile in the living room of her house and giving her family better living conditions.

It is worth pointing out that the previous loan was used to build an annex on her house, which she achieved with the support from Kiva.  This is why she says she is very grateful for the loans granted.  Her house is a project because it was small, but little by little she has been building and renovating for the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to install ceramic tile.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 53 years old and married with three children.

Alicia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a retail business in rice grains in the Philippines. She requested a 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

Alicia has borrowed and repaid 21 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the rice business for 11 years and also earns an income from buying and selling fermented shrimp and fish.

Alicia aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: Maria Auxiliadora de 37 años de edad es casada, trabaja en Acoyapa como docente desde hace 16 años. Esta solicitando su  credito con el objetivo de comprar materiales para mejorar la casa de su papà casa ubicada en la comarca San Agustin de Acoyapa, en donde habita con su esposo y sus hijos. Cabe mencionar que Maria Auxiliadora y sus hermanos son muy unidos y entre todos han luchado por apoyar a su papa a mejorar la propiedad familiar.
texts.en: Maria Auxiliadora, 37, is married and has been working as a teacher in Acoyapa for 16 years.  She is requesting her tenth loan in order to buy materials to renovate her father's house which is located in the San Agustin county in Acoyapa.  She lives there with her husband and children.  It is worth mentioning that Maria Auxiliadora and her siblings are very close and all of them have worked hard to support their father and improve the family's property.

loans.use: To buy materials to renovate her father's house.

loans.name: Emmelie

texts.en:
Emmelie, age 33, is married and has five children. She lives in Causwagan, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Emmelie owns a general store to earn a living. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store.

Emmelie has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Emmelie hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 54 years old and lives in Prenza, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is married and is the mother of three children. 

Rosalinda is a farmer; she plants, harvests and sells corn to earn a living. She has been in this business for 31 years. She earns 3,000 PHP a month from this business. 

She has requested a loan of PHP 5,850 to purchase fertilizers and pesticides. Rosalinda has been member a of GDMPC since the year 2010. 

In the future, Rosalinda hopes to expand her corn land to sustain her family's daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for her corn farming.

loans.name: Daylinda

texts.en:
Daylinda, age 52, is from Prenza Tangub City. She is widowed and has five children. 

To earn a living, Daylinda owns a business that provides motor transport services. Daylinda has been in this business for 20 years and earns 8,000 PHP a month from these activities. 

In 2010, Daylinda joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation as well as her ability to engage in business activities. 

Daylinda is requesting a loan of 17,600 PHP, which will be used to repair her vehicle to provide better service to her customers. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair her motorcycle to provide better service to her customers.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 49 years old and lives in Maular, Aloran Misamis Occidental. She is married and has five children. 

Evelyn has a sari-sari store (convenience store) business and earns approximately PHP 1,500 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to be used as additional capital to invest in her sari-sari store. 

Evelyn has been a member of PMPC for six years. In the future, Evelyn hopes to own a general merchandise store to earn money for her future.

Evelyn is a business-minded person and wants to finish her five children's studies.

Evelyn is an MIGS member of PMPC. She is thankful because PMPC has helped her to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to invest additional capital into her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Cinthia Mabel

texts.es:
La señora Cinthia, esta casada, tiene 2 hijos, reside en la aldea El Jícaro Galán de Nacaome, departamento de Valle. La señora se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva, calzado, bolsos, carteras, billeteras, y otros artículos. realiza esta actividad desde hace aproximadamente 3 años en donde sus principales clientes son las personas de barrios y colonias de Nacaome y San Lorenzo ya que ella los visita a domicilio.
Esta solicitando credito por la cantidad de L. 8,000.00 lempiras para invertirlos en la compra de ropa , calzado escolar para niño y útiles escolares ya que esta iniciando el periodo escolar y es un buen momento para generar mayores ventas y por ende mejores ingresos.
Su sueño es lograr mejorar la logística de su negocio y lograr instalar un puesto en el mercado.
texts.en:
Cinthia is married with two children and lives in the village of Jícaro Galán de Nacaome, department of Valle.  She works selling new clothing, footwear, bags, wallets, and other items.  She has been doing this work for approximately three years, and her main customers are people from the neighborhoods of Nacaome and San Lorenzo, because she visits them at home.

She is requesting a loan for the sum of 8,000 HNL to invest in buying clothing, schoolchildren's footwear, and school supplies, because the school year is beginning and it is a good time to generate more sales and, consequently, better income.

Her dream is to manage to improve the logistics of her business and set up a stall in the market.

loans.use: to buy clothing, school supplies, and shoes.

loans.name: Yous

texts.en:
Yous is 51 year old woman living with her husband and 8 children around the Prey Chor district of Kom-pong Cham province. Her main source of income is rice husbandry. She grows rice crops twice a year along with her husband.

In order to better her living condition, Yous would like to borrow some funds from HKL to fix some parts of present house. She will buy floorboards to replace the old broken ones and build a strong ladder for her house. For the future, Yous anticipates having a medium farm for raising poultry and pigs.

loans.use: to fix some parts of her present house

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy, age 37, is from Prenza Tangub City. She is married and has four children. To earn a living, Joy owns and operates a banana production business. Joy has been in her business for 10 years and earns approximately 9,000 PHP a month. 

In 2010, Joy joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Joy is requesting a new loan of 18,765 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings  and young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
El grupo 8 de Diciembre es de la ciudad de Villa Elisa, está integrado por 20 mujeres quienes trabajan en forma conjunta y siempre dentro de un ambiente de respeto. Ellas son jefas de familia, que se esfuerzan al máximo para poder dar a sus familias lo que necesitan para tener una vida sin privaciones.
Andrea forma parte del grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de bebidas hace un tiempo, gracias a lo cual puede ayudar a su familia. Comenta que siempre tienen mucha salida los productos que vende, especialmente los fines de semana, que es cuando más ventas tiene. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, y su meta es poder seguir creciendo como microempresaria para poder seguir ayudando a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, como ser cervezas, gaseosas, vinos, y demás variedades, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Ella está muy contenta por formar parte del programa de la fundación y de kiva.
texts.en:
The members of the "8 de Diciembre" group live in the city of Villa Elisa. It is made up of 20 women who work jointly, and always in an atmosphere of respect. They are parents that try their hardest to be able to give their families what they need to have a life without hardship.

Andrea is a member of the group. She has been selling beverages for some time, thanks to which she has been able to help her family. She says the products she carries always sell well, especially on weekends, which is when she has the most sales. 

She is a very hard-working and enterprising woman, and her goal is to continue growing as a small business owner, to be able to keep helping her family.

She is applying for the loan in order to buy beverages such as beers, soft drinks, wines, and others. In this way, she will be able to restock, and meet customer demand. She is very happy to be a part of the Foundation's program and of Kiva.

loans.use: To buy beers, soft drinks, wines, and other beverages.

loans.name: Elona

texts.en:
Elona is a married woman who has four children. Elona is 38 years old and resides at Tangub City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Elona plants and harvests bananas for sale to earn a living and she's been in this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) doing this type of business. 

She requested a loan of 9,100 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. In 2010, Elona joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Elona wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Phân

texts.en:
Phân, age 46, is in the business of rice husbandry. She has been happily in this business for over 20 years because she has her husband who is supportive in the maintenance of their rice field. Currently, she has a single school-aged child attending a junior high school in Kompong Cham province.

Phân now is asking for a loan from HKL, a Kiva partner, to purchase a used motorcycle for her husband to use to provide taxi service when he is available from rice farming. Phân hopes that this loan will help improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase a used motorcycle.

loans.name: Sok La

texts.en:
Sok La, 26, resides with her husband and child in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia, where she has been working in a garment factory for over three years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who can earn approximately USD 4 per day.

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Sok La is requesting a loan of USD 350 to purchase rice seeds to resell at a profit to farmers in the villages. In the future, she would like to expand her business, build a new house, and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds to resell for a profit.

loans.name: Thouk

texts.en:
Thouk, 50, resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia, where she has been selling vegetables for over three years, earning approximately USD 6 per day. Her husband works in the post office and earns approximately USD 5 per day, while one of her children is employed at a garment factory, earning approximately USD 3 per day.

Thouk is now requesting a loan of USD 700 to purchase more vegetables to sell so as to generate greater profit for the sake of her family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Mahmadali

texts.ru: Махмадали проживает в районе Хуросон. Ему 56 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается животноводством. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Кредит берет для закупа бычков и ремонта коровника.
texts.en: Mahmadali lives in the Khuroson district.  He is 56 years old, married and has five children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Mahmadali is involved in animal husbandry.  He earns a living by breeding cattle.  He is requesting this loan to purchase bulls and repair a cowshed.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and repair a cowshed

loans.name: Fidelia Paola

texts.es: Fidelia de 37 años de edad, es soltera, tiene 2 hijos estudiando, trabaja como impulsadora de ventas en el Super San Antonio. Esta solicitando  su 8vo credito con el objetivo de hacer las divisiones de los cuartos, ya que actualmente las tiene divididas con cortinas y asi brindar mayor comodidad  a su familia. Cabe señalar que fidelia gracias a los creditos que ha recibido ha logrado construir su propia casita, pues anteriormente vivia en casa de una hermana.
texts.en:
Fidelia is 37 years old, single, and has 2 childen, both of whom are in school. She works as a sales person in the San Antonio super market. She is requesting her 8th loan; this one for the purpose of sub-dividing her rooms to facilitate greater personal comfort for her family. At present, she  simply has the rooms divided by curtains.

It should be pointed out that Fidelia, thanks to the loans she previously received, has been able to construct her own little house. Previously, she lived in her sister's house.

loans.use: to divide rooms in her house.

loans.name: Kimatoy

texts.ru: Киматой более семи лет занимается скотоводством. Ей 44 года. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Киматой берет кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en: Kimatoy has been involved in animal husbandry for over seven years.  She is 44 years old, married and has four children.  She is requesting this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Nurjamal

texts.ru: Нуржамал 49 лет, замужем, имеет шестерых детей. В качестве источника дохода для  семьи, Нуржамал занимается животноводством и полеводством. Начав этот бизнес с покупки одной коровы, Нуржамал смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячным доходом от продажи молока в 3,000 сом (KGS). Также она возделывает  1,80 га земли, выращивая в основном фасоль. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Нуржамал обратилась в компанию «Бай  Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойных коров. Доходы от кредита Нуржамал планирует вложить в увеличение поголовья, что позволит ей увеличить свое хозяйство.
texts.en: Nurjamal is 49 years old, married and has six children.  She is involved in animal husbandry and farming to provide a source of income for her family.  Having started this business with one cow, Nurjamal was able to develop her business to have a monthly income of 3,000 som (KGS) from sales of milk.  She also works on 1.80 hectares of land, primarily growing beans.  In order to further increase livestock headcount, Nurjamal requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to purchase dairy cows.  She plans to invest the profits from the loan into increasing livestock headcount, which will allow her to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cows

loans.name: Bahriniso

texts.ru: Бахринисо 1965 года рождения замужем имеет 3 детей. Она торгует на рынке рисом. Осенью она выкупила оптом рис у фермеров по низкой цене. Но товар уже почти закончился. А зимой клиентов много которые покупают рис. Для увеличения своего товарооборота она получила кредит в нашей организации чтобы увеличить свой капитал.
texts.en: Bahriniso was born in 1965.  She is married and has three children.  She sells rice at a market.  Bahriniso bought rice wholesale from the farmers in the autumn at a low price, but her product inventory almost ran out.  And in the winter, she has many customers, who buy rice.  Bahriniso obtained this loan from our organization to increase her product turnover in order to increase her capital.

loans.use: to purchase rice

loans.name: Tha

texts.en:
Tha, 51, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing rice for over ten years, earning approximately 3 USD per day. Three of Tha's children are employed in a garment factory and earn approximately 10 USD per day. 

In order to improve her family's livelihood, Tha is requesting a loan of 700 USD to purchase a piece of farmland. She will use this land to grow rice in the dry season and generate more income to support her family. In the future, she would like to build a new wooden house and send her youngest child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a piece of farmland for growing rice in the dry season.

loans.name: Kunthea

texts.en:
Kunthea, 30, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in agricultural business for over ten years, earning approximately 3 USD per day. Additionally, her husband earns approximately 8 USD per day as a driver. 

Because of her family’s transportation difficulties, Kuthea is requesting a loan of 1000 USD to purchase a motorbike for family use and to help with her husband's commute. 

In the future, Kunthea would like to run a grocery store at home to generate extra income to support her family, rebuild her present house, and help her children get bachelor's degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike.

loans.name: Bibikhon

texts.ru: Бибихон проживает в городе Исфара. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Она занимается торговлей. Бибихон открыла мебельный магазин, где работает продавцом. В этой области она 13 лет. Она берет кредит для приобретения кухонной мебели и спальных гарнитуров.
texts.en: Bibikhon lives in the city of Isfara.  She is 39 years old, married and has three children.  She is involved in sales.  Bibikhon opened a furniture store, where she works as a salesperson.  She has been in this business for 13 years.  She is requesting this loan to purchase kitchen furniture and bedroom sets.

loans.use: to purchase new types of furniture

loans.name: Edwin Jose

texts.es:
Edwin, casado, padre familia, comercializa leche agria, vendiéndola ambulantemente también trabaja como guardia de seguridad y cumbre los pedidos que le hace en la zona de donde trabaja, así como los que su esposa vende en su casa de habitación, sumando el ingreso económico de la familia. Sus planes  mejorar poco a poco la infraestructura de su  vivienda. Con el préstamo anterior le realizo mejoras a su cuarto cambiarle le zinc viejo por nuevo, ahora con este ciclo de préstamo compra: cemento, arena, piedrín, hierro, bloques para construir un cuarto logrando cambiar las paredes de zinc por paredes de concreto de su casa y obtener mayores comodidad siendo un gran avance a cumplir sus proyectos y planes.
Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al alcanzar tener mayores comodidades y seguridad para con su familia.
texts.en:
Edwin is married and is a father. He sells fermented milk [similar to yogurt] as a street seller. He also works as a security guard and takes orders from the area where he works. His wife also sells from their house, increasing the household income. Their plan is to improve the infrastructure of their house bit by bit. With the previous loan he made improvements to their room, changing the old zinc for new zinc. Now, with this loan, he will buy: cement, sand, gravel, rebar, and cement block to build a room by changing the zinc walls for cement ones so that they can be more comfortable. This will be a big advance in his project and plans.

He is thankful to the lenders for their support in achieving improved comfort and security for his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Rin

texts.en:
Rin, 46, is married and resides with her husband and five children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been raising pigs to sell for over two years, earning approximately 3 USD per day. Her husband is a fisherman who also earns about 3 USD per day. Four of her children are employed in a garment factory and earn approximately 12 USD per day. 

In order to improve her family's livelihood, Rin is requesting a loan of 1,200 USD to pay for her son’s passport fee so that he can find a job in Thailand. With a passport, her son would be able to find a job legally in Thailand and generate more income for the family. 

In the future, Rin would like to expand her business, rebuild her present house to make it much stronger, and provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to pay for her son's passport fee.

loans.name: Angelie

texts.en:
Angelie is 35 years old and married with three children. She earns a living by fattening pigs in the Philippines. 

Angelie has been pig fattening for eight years and also earns additional income from food vending. She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Angelie works tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 47 years old and lives in Gango, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is married and the mother of four children. 

Nida owns and operates a banana farm as her source of income. She has been engaged in this business for seven years, and each month she earns 5,000 PHP.  

Nida has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young plants to raise. Nida has been a member of GDMPC since 2009. In the future, she hopes to increase her income to support her family's daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young plants to raise.

loans.name: Marhobokhon

texts.ru: Мархобохон проживает в городе Исфара. Ей 41 год. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации. Сама она занимается торговлей, она в основном продает сухофрукты и орехи. Этим видом бизнеса они занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для покупки орехов и изюма.
texts.en:
Marhobokhon lives in the Isfara region. She is 41 years old and married. She has three children. Her husband resides in the Russian Federation. 

Marhobokhon is engaged in trade, she mainly sells dried fruits and nuts. She has been engaged in this type of business for six years. She takes a loan for the purchase of nuts and raisins.

loans.use: to purchase nuts and raisins

loans.name: Betty Janneth

texts.es: La Señorita Betty tiene 25 años y es soltera no tiene hijos, ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa interior en una feria muy concurrida de la Ciudad de El Alto, esta es la quinta secuencia de su crédito dentro de la institución, Betty usara este préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción para terminar de construir una habitación en la casa de su Mama esta es la razón para solicitar este préstamo, la Señorita Betty enfrenta retos en su negocio ya que aun no cuenta con un puesto propio. Ella va a utilizar los beneficios ya que se mudará a la casa de la madre, la  señorita Betty desea muy pronto poder  comprar un puesto propio para ofrecer su mercadería y poder tener mas ingresos y de esta manera mejora su calidad de vida, se siente muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Betty is 25 years old. She is single and does not have children. She sells ladies’ underwear in a very busy market in the city of Ciudad de El Alto. This is her fifth loan cycle with the institution. Betty will use this loan to buy construction materials to finish building a room in her mother’s house. This is her reason for requesting the loan. Betty confronts challenges in her business because she doesn’t yet have her own market stall. She will use the savings from moving to her mother’s house. Betty hopes to soon be able to buy her own market stall where she can sell her merchandise and have more income and improve her quality of life. She feels very thankful to the institution for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish building a room

loans.name: Marisa

texts.en:
This is Marisa, 32, a resident of Silang, Cavite City, Philippines. She is married to Nepomuceno, a driver, and she is a mother to her three children. 

Marisa operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store that retails groceries, toiletries, and beverages piecemeal to the locals in the neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, five PHP-worth of cooking oil, or a single egg. Marisa earns her income by purchasing supplies at wholesale prices and then selling them individually. 

Marisa's store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community, and she earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day. She and her husband manage their own household while operating the business. At this time, Marisa is working hard to continually provide income for her family's everyday expenses and support her children’s schooling. 

To help her continue operation of her business, she is requesting a 21,000 PHP loan. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products needed in her business. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. 

Marisa hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams of giving her family a good future. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from studying the Word of God.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Touch

texts.en:
Touch, 51, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing agricultural crops for over twenty years, earning approximately 5 USD per day. One of her children is employed by a company and earns approximately 4 USD per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, Touch is requesting a loan of 750 USD to pay for her child’s wedding expenses. In the future, she would like to expand her agricultural business and support her youngest child's pursuit of a bachelor's degree. Moreover, she plans to rebuild her present house to make it much bigger and stronger and to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to pay for her child's wedding expenses.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Фируза проживает в городе Исфара. Ей 29 лет. Она не замужем. Фируза имеет высшее образование, товаровед по специальности. Сейчас она занимается торговлей. Она открыла магазин, где продает занавески и шторы. Она в основном привозит товар из Москвы. Этим видом деятельности занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для приобретения штор и занавесок.
texts.en:
Firuza lives in the Isfara region. She is 29 years old. She is not married. Firuza has higher education, with a specialization in goods management. Currently she works in trade. 

Firuza has opened a store where she sells curtains and blinds. She mainly imports goods from Moscow. She has been engaged in this type of activity for five years. She takes a loan for the purchase of blinds and curtains.

loans.use: to purchase blinds and curtains

loans.name: Gbenonbou Group

texts.fr: GBENONBOU est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Eulalie (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 46 ans. Eulalie est mariée à un certain clément. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Le couple a un autre enfant à charge, en dehors de leurs enfants. Eulalie  vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants, et assure ensemble avec lui, les diverses charges familiales. Eulalie a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Eulalie vend depuis plus de vingt ans, des conserves et des savons à son domicile. Eulalie s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux faire face à la demande de sa clientèle, Eulalie sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GBENONBOU un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits précédents ont été déjà remboursés.
texts.en:
Gbenonbou is a group of three people, the members of which live in the same neighborhood. The group's representative, Eulalie (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 46 years old. Eulalie is married to a man named Clément. The couple has two children, both in school and under their care. The couple is responsible for another child in addition to their own. Eulalie lives with her husband and children and, along with her husband, sees to the various family expenses. Eulalie's education ended in high school.

In order to cope with her various expenses, Eulalie has been selling canned food and soap from her home for more than 20 years. Eulalie finds her supplies at a market in Benin. In the hope of strengthening her business and better meeting customer demand, Eulalie, along with the other members of the Gbenonbou Group is seeking a fourth loan from Alidé. The previous loans have already been repaid.

loans.use: To purchase canned food and soap.

loans.name: Rorn

texts.en:
Rorn, 46, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up animals for over twenty years, earning approximately 5 USD per day. One of her children is employed in a bank and also earns approximately 5 USD per day. 

In order to develop her family’s economy, Rorn is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD to purchase more farmland for growing agricultural crops and to generate more income for the family. In the future, she would like to rebuild her present house and support her children as they pursue bachelor's degrees.

loans.use: to purchase more farmland for growing agricultural crops.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is from Gango, Ozamis City. She is 45 and married with three children. To make a living, Josephine plants, harvests, and sells bananas. She has been engaged in this business for four years and earns 3,500 PHP a month. 

In 2008, Josephine joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She is requesting a new loan of 7,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young plants to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from her business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedling, and young plants to raise.

loans.name: Doudedji Group

texts.fr: DOUDEDJI est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres vivent dans le même quartier.  La représentante du groupe, Hounssi Hélène (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 47 ans. Hounssi Hélène est mariée à un électronicien du nom de Marcellin. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à charge. Hounssi Hélène vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Hounssi Hélène a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Hounssi Hélène vend depuis plus de vingt ans, des chaussures et des vêtements de façon secondaire dans une ville du Benin. Hounssi Hélène s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité, Hounssi Hélène sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DOUDEDJI un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé en vue d’accroitre son chiffre d’affaire. le premier crédit dont Hounssi Hélène avait bénéficié a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
Doudedji is a group of three people, the members of which live in the same neighborhood. The group's representative, Hounssi Hélène (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 47 years old. Hounssi Hélène is married to an electrician by the name of Marcellin. The couple has three children, all in school and under their care. In addition to their children, the couple is also responsible for another child. Hounssi Hélène lives with her husband and children. The couple sees to the various household expenses together. Hounssi Hélène's education ended in high school.

In order to keep up with her various expenses, Hounssi Hélène has been reselling shoes and clothing in a town in Benin for more than 20 years. Hounssi Hélène finds her supplies in a market in Benin.

With the goal of strengthening her business, Hounssi Hélène, along with the other members of the Doudedji Group, is seeking a second loan from Alidé with an eye to increasing her sales. The first loan Hounssi Hélène received has been repaid.

loans.use: To purchase shoes.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en: Thelma is married with 4 children. She is 60 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is operating a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She's been doing this for 3 years, and earns PHP 2,000 each month. She has requested a loan of PHP 6,000 to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. In 2008, Thelma joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and standard of living. In the future, she hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en: Arlyn is married with 2 children. She is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is operating a service-based business, providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She's been doing this for 4 years, and earns PHP 5,000 each month. She has requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to repair a transport vehicle used in the business. In 2011, Arlyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and standard of living. In the future, she hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business

loans.name: Zarifjon

texts.ru: Зарифчон проживает в Гиссарском районе. Ему 27 лет. Он женат. Его жена домохозяйка. Он сам занимается торговлей хлеба. Он в основном покупает хлеб с пекарни и продает на рынке. Этим видом деятельности занимается четыре года. Он берет кредит для покупки муки. Зарифчон намерен у себя дома печь лепешки для продажи.
texts.en:
Zarifjon lives in the Gissar region. He is 27 years old and married. His wife is a housewife. 

Zarifjon is engaged in selling bread. He mainly buys bread from a bakery and sells at the market. He has been engaged in this type of activity for four years. He takes a loan to buy flour. Zarifjon intends to bake lepeshkas (a type of round, flat bread) for sale.

loans.use: to purchase flour

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa is separated and has three children. She is 48 years old, and lives in Mialen, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, in the Philippines. She owns and operates a gardening business, which she's been running for 5 years. Each month, she earns PHP 5,000. She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2008, Elsa joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and standard of living. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Totukan

texts.ru:
Тотукан 55 лет, замужем, имеет трех взрослых детей.  Тотукан на протяжении 25 лет занимается  животноводством и полеводством, стартовав этот бизнес с суммой 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду и настойчивости, Тотукан на сегодня имеет в хозяйстве одну корову, пять овец ,пять коз, приносящее около 6,000 сом прибыли в месяц. Также Тотукан выращивает клевер, заготовив в качестве корма 600 снопов. 
В целях дальнейшего расширения бизнеса, Тотукан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку овец - молодняка для откорма и перепродажи. Доходы от кредита она планирует направить на увеличение поголовья скота в будущем.
texts.en: Totukan is 55 years old, married and has three adult children.  She has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for 25 years, starting this business with a sum of 10,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to hard work and persistence, Totukan's business consists of one cow, five sheep, and five goats today, yielding about 6,000 som in profit every month.  She also grows clover and stocked up livestock feed of 600 sheaves.  In order to further expand her business, Totukan requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy young sheep for fattening up and resale.  She plans to use the profits from the loan to increase livestock headcount in the future.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Dedewanou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe « DEDEWANOU» est composé de trois personnes qui sont issues de la même famille. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Julienne est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Julienne est âgée de 43 ans et vit au Benin. Julienne est mariée à un chauffeur du nom de Raphael. Le couple a six enfants, tous scolarisés, mais deux ne sont plus à leur charge. Julienne vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Julienne supporte ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges familiales. Pour y parvenir, Julienne vend du « Ablo » (aliment local fait à base du riz) accompagné de poissons frits à son domicile. Julienne mène cette activité depuis six ans. Julienne achète ses produits au Bénin, et vend son repas à son domicile. Julienne désire satisfaire un plus grand nombre de clients par son produits, mais Julienne ne dispose pas suffisamment de moyens financiers pouvant lui permettre de rehausser le niveau de son activité. C’est pour ce faire que Julienne sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe « DEDEWANOU ». Les deux crédits reçus précédemment ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The "Dedewanou" Group is made up of three people who come from the same family. The group's representative, Julienne, is the woman raising her hand in the photo. Julienne is 43 years old and lives in Benin. Julienne is married to a driver by the name of Raphael. The couple has six children, all in school, but two are no longer in their care. Julienne lives with her children and her husband. Julienne and her husband see to the various family expenses together. In order to do so, Julienne sells "Ablo" (a local, rice-based food), accompanied by fried fish, from her home. Julienne has been running this business for six years. She purchases her wares in Benin and sells her meals from her home.

Julienne would like to please a larger number of customers with her products, but her financial means are not substantial enough to allow her to build up her business. It's for this reason that Julienne, along with the other members of the "Dedewanou" Group, is seeking a third loan from Alidé. The two previously received loans have been repaid.

loans.use: To purchase fish and sacks of rice.

loans.name: Izzat

texts.ru: Izzatu 40 let. On jenat, u nego 2 detey kotorie xodat v shkolu.  On zanimaetsa skotovodstvom 20 let,  sfera ego deyatelnosti eto prodaja masya. Izzat xochet postriot kamennoe stoylo, segodna emu prixoditsa derjat jivotnix v postroyke iz grazevoy glini. Zimoy tam xolodno I eto oslojnayet  ego biznes. Radi etogo dela on prosit 600 AZN. V ego plani na budushee vxodit postroyka sobsvtvennogo magazina. On uveren chto vse ego trudi ne naprasni, Izzat staraetsa radi budushego svoix detey.
texts.en: Izzat is 40 years old, married and has two children, who attend school.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for 20 years.  His business focus is selling meat.  Izzat wants to build a stone stall because today he has to keep animals in a building from dirt clay.  It is cold there in the winter, which makes his business difficult.  This is why he is requesting 600 AZN.  His future plans also include a construction of his own store.  Izzat is certain that his work is not useless.  He tries hard for his children's future.

loans.use: to build a stone stall for livestock

loans.name: Nuri

texts.ru: Нури кредитуется в организации с 2005 года. Она занимается продажей хозяйственных средств, которые закупает у фирм. Она каждый свой кредит использует на увеличение товарооборота.Раньше её ассортимент товаров был не большой, поэтому и продажа была не важной, но из-за увеличения разнообразных товаров для женщин, у неё торговля стала стабильной. Вот и следующий кредит она хочет потратить на закуп праздничных парфюмерных наборов для женщин под женский праздник. Она уверяет , что на праздники она сможет хорошо продать товар и получить хороший доход.
texts.en: Nuri has been working with our organization since 2005.  She is involved in selling household goods that she buys from firms.  She uses each one of her loans for increasing goods turnover.  Previously, her goods selection was limited, and, hence, her sales were not good, but her sales became stable due to including various goods for women in her merchandise selection.  Nuri wants to use this next loan to buy holiday perfume gift sets for women prior to the women's holiday.  She assures us that she would be able to sell the merchandise well for the holidays and make a good profit.

loans.use: to purchase holiday perfume sets

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Lilia works hard to support her family. An ambulant vendor of used clothing in the Philippines, she also earns income from selling dried fish and farming sugarcane.

Lilia is requesting a loan of PHP 25000 through NWTF to buy additional bundles of used clothes to sell. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF and hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional bundles of used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Monica Marizela

texts.es: La Sra. Mónica, es una cliente antigua que esta en su tercera secuencia de crédito con nuestra institución, se dedica  ala elaboración de empanadas, galletas y pan, esta solicitando el crédito para la compra de un horno industrial, la Sra. Mónica es repostera hace dos años, vive en la zona de Tacagua en la casa de sus papás, ella expende sus productos ambulando en las galerías y entregando a algunas tiendas de barrio. La Sra. Mónica, es una cliente trabajadora y dinámica, con buena actitud crediticia, su meta es reunir un buen capital y con el tiempo ampliar su negocio, para luego expandirlo más y de esta manera incrementar sus ingresos y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida, la Sra. Mónica se siente muy feliz y agradecida con al institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mónica is a long-time client that is in her third loan cycle with our institution. She makes empanadas, cookies, and bread. She is requesting the loan to buy an industrial oven. Mónica has been working as a baker for two years. She lives in the Tacagua neighborhood, in her parent’s house. She sells her products as a street vendor in the covered corridors and also to some stores in the neighborhood. Mónica is a hardworking and dynamic client with a good attitude toward credit. Her goal is to save a good amount of capital and, with time, grow her business and later expand it even more. In this way she will improve her quality of life. Mónica feels very happy and thankful to the institution for the support it has provided.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven

loans.name: Amangeldy

texts.en:
Mr. Amangeldy, 31, is a plumber in a private company in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. He has been doing this job for a half year. 

His family lives in an old wooden house which was built early. But in the last several years, it has been becoming old and notably bad to live in. Its internal decoration is in especially bad condition. 

Therefore he decided to make renovations to his old house. Now he needs some money to have the necessary building materials for the internal decoration job. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchase the building materials for his house renovation.

loans.use: to purchase the building materials for his house renovation.

loans.name: Heap

texts.en:
Heap is raising pigs in a pigpen in her yard to generate a livelihood. She has been involved in this business for five years and she has learned a lot from this project. With the good experience she gained, Heap would like to continue to run this business forward to attain a satisfactory result. She is now 34 years old and married with a lovely child.

With the requested amount, she will buy a few breeding pigs and feed to fatten her pigs. Heap is very happy that our lenders are helping her to develop her pig project further. With the increase in income, she will save to enlarge her pigpen and raise additional pigs.

loans.use: to buy a few breeding pigs and feed to fatten her pigs.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 42 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Marilyn is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Marilyn has been raising pigs for thirteen years and also earns additional income from a sari-sari (variety) store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es:
El señor Adrián tiene 37 años de edad él vive en el Sindicato Camargo una comunidad de la provincia Carrasco a  diez kilómetros del Municipio de Chimoré de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  él señor Adrián se encuentra separado de su esposa la señora Noemí con la cual tiene una hija. Adrián trabaja como chofer en el Sindicato 2 de Junio. El señor Adrián  vivía en otra comunidad  Bulo Bulo hace como diez años atrás junto a su esposa y su hija  pues  tuvo que trasladarse a  Chimoré por la separación con su esposa ,a consecuencia de dicha separación  perdió su casa y todas sus pertenencias , gracias al apoyo de su padre volvió a retomar  su vida , actualmente  él tiene su propia casa  y terrenos agrícolas  en los cuales siembra Arroz mismo que cosecha cada  tres meses, esta es su principal fuente de   ingresos, además  trabaja como chofer en el sindicato 2 de junio.
  El préstamo que solicita Adrián es para legalizar su vehículo  y de esa manera podrá tener más ingresos  porque trabajara con su vehículo propio y continuara pagando sus estudios de su hija.
 Adrián sueña con un futuro mejor para su hija, que pueda estudiar una carrera profesional y tener un mejor nivel de vida  ya que el señor Adrián no pudo terminar el colegio ni hacer una carrera.
texts.en:
Adrián is 37 years old. He lives in Sindicato Camargo, a community in the province of Carrasco, ten kilometers from the municipality of Chimoré, which belongs to the city of Cochabamba. Adrián is separated from his wife, Noemí, with whom he has a daughter. Adrián works as a driver in the June 2 Labor Union. Adrián lived in another community, Bulo Bulo, about ten years ago with his wife and daughter, but he had to move to Chimoré because of the separation from his wife. As a consequence of the separation he lost his house and all of his belongings. Thanks to his father’s support, he has gotten back on his feet. He now has his own house and agricultural land where he plants rice, which he harvests every three months. This is his main source of income. He also works as a driver in the June 2 Labor Union. 

The loan that Adrián is requesting is to legalize his vehicle. By doing this he will have more income because he would be working with his own vehicle and continue paying for his daughter’s studies. 

Adrián dreams of a better future for his daughter, that she will be able to study a professional career and have a better quality of life, since Adrián wasn’t able to finish high school or study any higher education.

loans.use: to legalize his vehicle

loans.name: David Angel

texts.es: El señor David se dedica a la compra y venta de artículos de computadora y repuestos de todo tipo el señor es soltero vende en la feria mas concurrida de la ciudad de el Alto,  tiene su puesto fijo donde ofrece sus artículos, con el dinero del crédito comprara artículos de computadora y repuestos el Sr. David  vive en la casa de sus papas a quienes ayuda con los gastos del hogar vende los jueves y domingos  el vive por la zona Bajo Llojeta, el es un joven muy responsable y trabajador con ganas de superación ya que el solo mantiene sus gastos y su educación, desea con el tiempo tener una carrera universitaria, se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: David buys and sells computer parts and accessories of all types.  He’s single and sells in the busiest fair in the city of Alto, where he has a fixed location where he offers his products.  He will use the money from this loan to buy his computer accessories and parts.  David lives in his parents’ house, whom he helps out with the household expenses.  He makes his sales on Thursdays and Sundays and lives in the Bajo Llojeta zone.  He’s a very hard working and responsible young man with a desire to succeed.  He pays for his own school expenses and in time he would like a career as a collage graduate.  He is happy and grateful for the support he has received.

loans.use: to buy computer accessories and spare parts.

loans.name: Leonesa

texts.en:
Leonesa is from Malibangcao, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 44 years old, married, and has five children.
 
Leonesa used her last loan to purchase new equipment and tools to expand her business. Her business has grown and become successful. Now she is taking a new loan to purchase new items to expand her product offerings. Positively, she hopes to be able to grow her business more.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offerings.

loans.name: Altansukh

texts.en: Altansukh is requesting a loan to purchase the necessary building materials to make renovations to his old apartment again. He hopes it will have a good influence on his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase the necessary building materials to make renovations to his old apartment.

loans.name: Jeanny

texts.en:
Jeanny is 29 years old and from Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is now married and has one child. 

Jeanny owns and operates a banana plantation for their living. Every month, she earns an estimated total of PHP 5,000. In 2010, Jeanny joined GDMPC to be able to use financial services. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000, which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. 

She expects to reap a good harvest and will invest in business expansion from the expected revenue to be generated.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya. She is a married mother of five children. Juliet owns a nursery/preschool which has been in operation for a year. She walked from house to house, inviting students to join her school. Most of these students could not afford fees and even school fees.

Juliet learned of Milango from the company's employees and decided to join in order to access credit. Juliet is applying for a loan of 50,000 Kenya shillings to purchase chairs, writing boards, chalk and books.

She aspires to increase the number of students in the future despite the initial low enrollment and will use the extra income to start other businesses.

loans.use: To purchase chairs, writing boards, chalk and books.

loans.name: 26 De Enero Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “26 DE ENERO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Panamericana, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Sonia es la presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: carpintería, elaboración de mantas de vicuña, venta de pescado, tejido de manta, venta de chuño y papa, venta de ropa.

La señora Sonia,  indica que es el tercer año que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una socia. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido de mantas que viene trabajando hace años, mismo que aprendió de sus amigas.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana) que adquiere de la Ceja  y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro y compartir con las socias.
texts.en:
The community bank "26 of January" is starting its first cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the focal center Panamericana.  It is made up of nine associates and is run by a board of directors where Mrs. Sonia is the president.  The businesses that the members of the association run are varied, among them are carpentry, the making of vicuña blankets, fish sales, blanket weaving, starch and potato sales, clothing sales.

Mrs Sonia notes that this is the third years that she is working for Pro Mujer and that she joined the institution when asked by one of the members.  Currently she has a business weaving blankets, which she has been doing for many years.  She has learned this trade from her friends.

The loan that she is requesting is to increase her working capital, through the purchase of wool. which she gets from Ceja and after working with it she will sell her products to order.  This work allows her to generate income to help her family as she is married and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the savings and the sharing with the other members.

loans.use: to purchase wool for the making of blankets.

loans.name: Gloria Mercedes

texts.es: La señora Gloria , es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su esposo , ella forma un hogar hace ocho meses , ya que esperaba un bebé , lo cual esto le a causado muchos problemas por la bebé , que salió enferma de alergia y tuvo que abandonar el trabajo , ahora ella se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas y verduras para poder sacar adelante a su hija , agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atravez de los fondos Kiva ya que con los créditos anteriores logro mejorar su vivienda y tiene como meta poder mejorar la parte trasera de la misma ya que esta cubierta  de pedazos de zinc ya deteriorados y en los tiempo de lluvia todo el agua que cae ingresa a la vivienda .El préstamo lo invertirá en materiales de construcción como bloques , piedra , arena , etc. .
texts.en: Gloria lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe, along with her husband. She got married eight months ago, because she was pregnant. She has had many difficulties with the baby, because it was born with allergies and she had to quit her job. Now she buys and sells fruits and vegetables so that she can help her daughter get ahead. She is thankful for the support provided by Afodenic through the Kiva funding. With her previous loans she has improved her housing and her goal is to improve the rear part of the house because it is covered by pieces of tin roofing that are deteriorated. When it rains, water drips into the house. The loan will be used to buy construction materials such as cement blocks, gravel, sand, etc.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok is 44 years old and a mother who has been blessed with four children. She permanently lives in Prey Chor district and grows rice there for generating income. Besides this, she goes through the village to collect and buy recycled material, whereas her husband shares his responsibility by working as a construction worker from place to place around the Kompong Cham province.

Sok would like to seek a loan from HKL, one of Kiva's partners, to rent a plantation for growing potato crops, from which she’ll be able to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to rent a plantation for growing potato crops.

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en: Emelyn is 35 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. Emelyn has a rice field and she harvests & sells rice grains during harvest time. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan of 25,000 PHP to buy fertilizers for the farm. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Emelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the rice farm.

loans.name: Ronie

texts.en:
Ronie is 38 years old and resides in Lopez Jaena, Misamis, Occidental, Philippines.  He is married and has three children. 

Ronie operates both a banana plantation and a gardening business to earn a living.  He has been in business for five years.  Each month, he earns 15,000 PHP doing this type of work.  He has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to pay for the labor cost to increase crop yield.

In 2010, Ronie joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services in order to help improve both his business and his living situation. I n the future, Ronie wants to save money to serve as a resource for future emergencies.

loans.use: to pay for the labor cost to increase crop yield.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: La señora Elena se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en su propia tienda de barrio ubicada  al norte de la ciudad de El Alto de la Paz Bolivia, esta actividad la realiza hace mas de 10 años, la señora Elena abre su tienda a las 6:00 am y termina su labor a las 23:00 pm, las ventas son diarias ya que los artículos que oferta son de primera necesidad, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de abarrotes como fideo, arroz, azúcar y aceite, la señora Elena tiene dos hijos menores de edad los cuales estudian,  por lo que lucha cada día para salir adelante y algún día sus hijos puedan estudiar una carrera profesional y así puedan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elena has been selling groceries in her own grocery store for over ten years in a suburb located in El Alto de la Paz, Bolivia. She opens her store at 6am and finishes work at 11pm every day, since the items she sells are essential goods. 

Elena will use this loan to purchase groceries such as noodles, rice, sugar and oil. Elena has two young children who are both studying. They are the reason why she struggles every day to get ahead so that one day her children might be able to undertake a degree and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase groceries such as noodles, rice, sugar and oil

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is from Villaflor, Oroquieta, Misamis Occidental. She is 31 years old. Evelyn is married and has one child. 

To make a living, Evelyn runs a food stall, selling grilled chicken, pork, and hotdogs in the local community. Evelyn has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Evelyn is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase ingredients such as pork and hot dog to sell. In 2012, Evelyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as pork and hot dog to sell

loans.name: Meriam

texts.en:
Meriam is forty-three years old, married, with three children. She happily lives in Liloan, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. Meriam is engaged in the food business, cooking and selling a variety of foods. She has been in this business for over ten years. She is not engaged in any other line of business. Meriam is hands-on with her business. The return is quite good. The micro-credit requested is to purchase food & drinks for the restaurant
. Meriam plans to make her business bigger and from the income generated will pay for her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase food & drinks for the restaurant

loans.name: Gulchahira

texts.en: Bai Tushum and Partners expresses gratitude to all Kiva lenders who helped Gulchahira obtain her first Kiva loan, which was used as intended and repaid. She was able to increase her herd. As an additional source of income for her family, Gulchahira opened a small grocery store. Now Gulchahira has applied for a loan of 100,000 KGS for purchasing additional cattle and an assortment of goods for her store. Revenues from this loan will be used to pay for her younger daughter's education.

loans.use: To purchase cattle and store inventory

loans.name: Barceliza

texts.en:
Barceliza is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married.  

Barceliza has a shop that sells personal items like shirts, blouses, bath towels and hand towels.  She has had this business for 10 years. 

Barceliza requested a loan for 15,000 PHP to buy stocks of clothing and towels to sell.  She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Barceliza hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: buy towels and clothing

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en:
Maribeth is 35 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has 2 children. 

Maribeth has a retail shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 6 years. She requested a loan for 9,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages to resell.

Maribeth has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: buy canned goods, snacks & beverages

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 52 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married . 

Jocelyn is providing manicure and pedicure services. She has had this business for fifteen years. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy materials for the services.

Jocelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy materials for the manicure and pedicure services.

loans.name: Sabina Olga

texts.es:
La señora Sabina tiene 48 años de edad ella vive en el Sindicato Alto San Pablo de la provincia Carrasco a unos diez kilómetros del Municipio de Chimore, de la ciudad de Cochabamba, está casada con el sr. Benjamín con el cual tiene 3 hijos, la señora  Sabina se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y el esposo  a la crianza y engorde  de ganado. La señora Sabina  vivía en Sora Sora Oruro hace como veinte años atrás  tuvo que venir a vivir al Sindicato Alto San Pablo porque en Sora Sora hay una extrema pobreza y  no tenia   ingresos suficientes para poder mantener a sus hijos,  dejo toda sus  pertenencias en busca de un mejor nivel de vida, con el apoyo de su esposo y trabajado pudieron lograr ese objetivo, actualmente cuentan con una pequeña casa y terrenos agrícolas donde hay pasto para la alimentación de su ganado.  
El préstamo que solicita la señora  Sabina es para la compra de ganado  con lo cual  incrementa sus ganado y tendrá mayores   utilidades. 
La señora  Sabina sueña con un futuro mejor para sus hijos, que puedan estudiar una carrera profesional y de esa manera tener un mejor nivel de vida, ya que ella no pudo terminar el colegio ni hacer una carrera.
texts.en:
Sabina is 48 years old and lives in Sindicato Alto San Pablo, located in the Carrasco province at some ten kilometres from the municipality of Chimore in Cochabamba. She is married to Benjamin and they have three children. 

Sabina works selling groceries while her husband works raising and fattening up cattle. About twenty years ago Sabina lived in Sora Sora Oruro, but she had to move to Sindicato Alto San Pablo because Sora Sora is extremely poor and she wasn't making enough money to raise her children. She left all her belongings in search of a better quality of life and with the support of her husband and through a lot of work they were able to fulfil this dream. They have a small house and agricultural land with which they are able to feed their cattle.

The loan that Sabina is applying for will be used to purchase cattle which will increase her current livestock and create more profits. 

Sabina dreams of a better future for her children. She hopes that they might be able to study a degree to have a better quality of life, since she was not able to finish high school or go to university.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to fatten them up

loans.name: Amour De L’Eternel Group

texts.fr: AMOUR DE L’ETERNEL est un groupe de cinq personnes, dont les membres sont issus de la même famille. La représentante du groupe, Léocadie (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 43 ans. Léocadie est mariée à un cuisinier nommé Pierrot. Le couple a cinq enfants tous scolarisés, mais il y a un des enfants qui ne vit plus à leur charge. Léocadie vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Léocadie n’a jamais fréquenté l’école. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Léocadie vend des produits cosmétiques à son domicile. Léocadie s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue d’élargir son activité, Léocadie sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble  avec les autres membres du groupe AMOUR DE L’ETERNEL. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en: AMOUR DE L'ETERNEL is a group made up of 5 women from the same family.  The facilitator of the group, Léocadie (who is raising her hand in the photo), is 43 years old.  She is married to a cook named Pierrot.  The couple has 5 children, who all attend school, but one of their children is no longer their dependent. Léocadie lives with her husband and children.
